name: Eliminating Power Structures
description: Dismantling the institutional and systemic frameworks that sustain PSN authority.

cards.title: Undermining Corrupt Hierarchies
cards.description: Weakening structural control mechanisms that allow PSNs to maintain power.
bulletpoints: Identifying key vulnerabilities in corrupt institutions.
Disrupting command chains by eliminating strategic enablers.
Using controlled systemic chaos to force regime collapse.

cards.title: Subverting Controlled Systems
cards.description: Using decentralized strategies to bypass PSN-controlled systems.
bulletpoints: Creating independent economic and social infrastructures.
Redirecting resources away from PSN-controlled networks.
Utilizing covert influence strategies to reroute decision-making authority.

cards.title: Constructing Alternative Leadership Models
cards.description: Building sustainable leadership structures free from PSN influence.
bulletpoints: Developing leaderless governance models resistant to manipulation.
Fostering community-based accountability systems to prevent PSN infiltration.
